title: Can't login, can't queue, can't do anything
body:
Whenever I launch the LOL client it seems to play around, A LOT. Whenever I try to open the shop or the hextech crafting or my profile and even just the menu in general it disconnects me from the PVP.net. And I am forced to play other games and no longer play LOL. Please help because I've tried turning of IP-Helper, updating Windows, and even updating Directx and none of these solutions work.

Thx, Gangster.{{item:3073}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

That sounds odd, could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me.
Help me out thanks so much dude.
